rules_text:
When Indolent Leech enters the battlefield, target creature card in your graveyard gains unearth until end of turn. The unearth cost is equal to its mana cost reduced by {2}.
Unearth {2}{G} [i]({2}{G}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
